question: Mukhyamantri Dal Bhat Yojna (MDBY) is a subsidised food scheme of which state government?
explanation:
The state government of Jharkhand recently presented its budget for the financial year 2020-21. IT announced a financial assistance of Rs 5000 to Rs 7000 per annum to unemployed graduate and post-graduate youth.
The state government also proposed to provide 100 units free electricity and to set up 100 mohalla clinics across the state. The Mukhyamantri Dal Bhat Yojna (MDBY) was revived to provide a meal at the price of Rs.5 to the poor people of the state.
